abstract: Opera Collective gives free lunchtime concert in Richard Tucker Square as part of series organized by Lincoln Square Business Improvement District; music blends with cacophony of city and audience consists of wide variety of New Yorkers and tourists.
lead_paragraph: Singers with Opera Collective, taking part in an outdoor concert series, said their previous performances in subway stations had prepared them to drown out the cacophony of sirens, traffic and chatty parkgoers.

headline.main: Opera in Park, Harmonizing (Mostly) With City’s Hum
headline.print_headline: Opera in Park, Harmonizing (Mostly) With City’s Hum

snippet: Singers with Opera Collective, taking part in an outdoor concert series, said their previous performances in subway stations had prepared them to drown out the cacophony of sirens, traffic and chatty parkgoers.
